title: Abomination

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you ignore someone, you will not be able to gain stress from them for the night.
- You have a stress meter which goes up to 10.
- You will be notified of where your stress meter is at the end of each night.
- When you are visited, you gain 2 stress, and gain one additional stress if you were roleblocked, attacked, investigated, or controlled.
- If your stress meter ever reaches ten, you will rampage at your own house.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to the end of the game, while having killed less than five people.

desc:
Post 1444
*Tortured and reclusive... this man is more dangerous than he seems...*
